item.description:
[Alert level: PillowCon 2]  

Inquisitive Minds Needs You!

 

Comrades in pillows, the battle orders have arrived from Banditos Misteriosos Joint Command. Saturday the 2nd, somewhere in Boston, we will fight in the grand rebel alliance.

 

From their web site www.misteriosos.org : "Banditos Misteriosos is proud to announce that the tradition continues - Boston will again be participating in World Pillow Fight Day 2011!

Budapest, Cape Town, Tel Aviv, Caracas, Chicago, London,

Los Angeles, New York City, Zurich, Paris, Stockholm, Beijing, Valencia,

Vancouver, Rome, Warsaw, Washington DC, Istanbul

This is just a short list of the over 140 cities worldwide that took up pillow arms in the . Over 1,500 Banditos of all ages battled it out in Boston - making it the second largest pillow fight, right behind NYC!"

"For those who don't know about these pillow fights, they are quite fun and simple!

Show up at 2:55pm, remain inconspicuous to the best of your abilities. Hide your pillow in bags, big jackets, random trees.

At 3pm, you'll hear the very obvious signal, rush in and pillow fight away."


The Rules:

1. Bring a pillow, a soft one is preferred.

2. No feathered pillows - let's keep the mess low.

3. Don't hit anyone without a pillow

4. If you are wearing glasses, make sure you take them off.

5. Don't hit people with cameras

6. Go all out!

7. Run from anyone dressed as a clown!

 

Be sure to arrive early!
